channel.title: Suggestion able to delete own topic
channel.description: does anyone think itd be good to have a option to delete our own topics?

item.title: Suggestion able to delete own topic
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Nor are they supposed to be. However, if competent and willing staff ran the dictatorship-of-a-site, then perhaps they wouldn’t need to be a democracy.

Read full topic

Well i don’t see how locking your own topics could be bad?
[/quote]
Then some noobs would make a topic lock it and unlock it and so on thinking they’re funny.[/quote]
like me.

imo only responsible posters should be able too, like silver lining.

item.title: Suggestion able to delete own topic
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“S!ms, post:18, topic:168839”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=228479.msg1968775#msg1968775 date=1199214089]

The reason against being able to delete your own topic has already been discussed, and the reason you shouldn’t be able to lock your own topic is because people start arguments, and then have the last word and lock them, only staff should have those two powers.
[/quote]Thats true.

Duh, mopar said it :)[/quote]
he also said moparisthebest, but we all know thatsnot true.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion able to delete own topic

item.description:
@lothy wrote:

To be honest with you, it’s bad enough when a dickhead comes along and bumps a topic, waits for someone to have a go at them for it, and then deletes their post.
The person having a go at the guy who bumped it then looks like the bumper, and yeah. Problem time if it isn’t looked into properly.
